<!-- badges: end -->

Research project conducted by Alain Danet at the Comte Lab (Illinois State
University). The project is supervised by Lise Comte, Julian Olden and Xingli
Giam.

## Organisation

See [starting.R]() to see how the file was created. 

- Research compendium: 
  - functions in `R/`
  - pipeline in `_targets.R` 
  - report and analysis in `doc/`
  - scientific paper and supplementary in: `paper/` 
- Reproducibility: use of `targets` framework: https://books.ropensci.org/targets/
